docs.snippet: Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump says his trademark hairdo is for real....

headline.main: Segway Knocks Bolt Off His Stride at the Bird's Nest
headline.print_headline: Segway Knocks Bolt Off His Stride at the Bird's Nest

docs.snippet: A television cameraman and his Segway succeeded in doing what none of Usain Bolt's rivals could in the 200 meters final at world championships on Thursday -- knock the Jamaican off his stride, and his feet, during his lap of honor....
docs.lead_paragraph: A television cameraman and his Segway succeeded in doing what none of Usain Bolt's rivals could in the 200 meters final at world championships on Thursday -- knock the Jamaican off his stride, and his feet, during his lap of honor.

headline.main: Caterpillar Inc Plans to Cut 475 More Jobs Amid Revenue Decline
headline.print_headline: Caterpillar Inc Plans to Cut 475 More Jobs Amid Revenue Decline

docs.snippet: Heavy machinery manufacturer Caterpillar Inc said it plans a new round of layoffs to cut costs as declining revenues from global mining and construction activities erodes its bottom line....
docs.lead_paragraph: Heavy machinery manufacturer Caterpillar Inc said it plans a new round of layoffs to cut costs as declining revenues from global mining and construction activities erodes its bottom line.

headline.main: Wal-Mart to Stop Selling AR-15, Other Semi-Automatic Rifles
headline.print_headline: Wal-Mart to Stop Selling AR-15, Other Semi-Automatic Rifles

docs.snippet: Wal-Mart Stores Inc, the United States' top seller of guns and ammunition, said on Wednesday it would stop selling the AR-15 and other semi-automatic rifles because of sluggish demand and focus instead on "hunting and sportsman firearms."...
docs.lead_paragraph: Wal-Mart Stores Inc, the United States' top seller of guns and ammunition, said on Wednesday it would stop selling the AR-15 and other semi-automatic rifles because of sluggish demand and focus instead on "hunting and sportsman firearms."

headline.main: Remaining Panda Cub Healthy at National Zoo After Twin Dies
headline.print_headline: Remaining Panda Cub Healthy at National Zoo After Twin Dies

docs.snippet: Animal keepers say the National Zoo's remaining newborn panda cub is healthy and was active and nursing through the night after the cub's smaller twin died....
docs.lead_paragraph: Animal keepers say the National Zoo's remaining newborn panda cub is healthy and was active and nursing through the night after the cub's smaller twin died.

headline.main: Jury Begins Deliberations in New Hampshire Prep School Rape Trial
headline.print_headline: Jury Begins Deliberations in New Hampshire Prep School Rape Trial

docs.snippet: The jury in the rape trial of a former student at an elite New Hampshire boarding school began deliberations on Thursday after hearing closing arguments focusing on whether he forced a 15-year-old classmate to have sex or whether she accused him t...
docs.lead_paragraph: The jury in the rape trial of a former student at an elite New Hampshire boarding school began deliberations on Thursday after hearing closing arguments focusing on whether he forced a 15-year-old classmate to have sex or whether she accused him to save her reputation.

headline.main: Twitter Tries to Lure in Users as It Searches for CEO
headline.print_headline: Twitter Tries to Lure in Users as It Searches for CEO

docs.snippet: Twitter's most urgent task is naming a new CEO. But the most formidable one is convincing more people that its service is essential, easy to use and not just meant for celebrities, 16-year-olds and news junkies....
docs.lead_paragraph: Twitter's most urgent task is naming a new CEO. But the most formidable one is convincing more people that its service is essential, easy to use and not just meant for celebrities, 16-year-olds and news junkies.
